content.query:
select [state]
    , [date]
    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [positive]) AS "Row Number"
    , SUM(positive) OVER(PARTITION BY [state]) AS Total
from dbo.COVID_TRACKING
ORDER BY [state], [Row Number];

SELECT [state]
    , PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY positive) OVER(PARTITION BY [state]) AS MedianCont 
    , PERCENTILE_DISC(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY positive) OVER(PARTITION BY [state]) AS MedianDisc
from dbo.COVID_TRACKING
ORDER BY [state];

SELECT [state]
    , [date]
    , positive
    , LAG(positive, 1, 0) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [date]) AS previous_day_pos
    , positive - LAG(positive, 1, 0) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [date]) AS diff
from dbo.COVID_TRACKING
ORDER BY [state], [date];    

SELECT [state]
    , [date]
    , positive
    , FIRST_VALUE([date]) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY positive ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING) AS fewest_day
from dbo.COVID_TRACKING
ORDER BY [state], [date];  

SELECT [state]
    , [date]
    , positive
    , SUM([positive]) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [date] ROWS BETWEEN 4 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS moving_sum_5days
    , AVG([positive]) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [date] ROWS BETWEEN 4 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS moving_avg_5days
    , SUM([positive]) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [date] ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING) AS cum_sum
    , SUM([positive]) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [date] ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) AS running_sum_3days
from dbo.COVID_TRACKING
ORDER BY [state], [date];
